name: Tangaroa
description:
Tangaroa is a survival game where you play as a god of sea with the power to control water. 

GOAL

  • Keep your believers faithful.
  • Build yourself a totem.

CONTROLS

  • WASD : Move
  • Space   : Pick up items / absorb water
  • E             : Rain on the island (need water)

A  game for Global Game Jam 2017:

http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/tangaroa
